Body:
I have my python code with MongoDB running over Raspbian OS and I want get shifted to the Windows 10 IOT core os of Raspberry PI.

I just want to know how can I install MongoDB over the Windows IOT core.

Thanks
Hello @RitaHan-MSFT thanks for reply but the person has answered wrong. I've myself installed MongoDB on Raspbian and Ubuntu Mate
But they're quire heavier os for Raspberry Pi I'm trying to deploy it on Windows IOT Core
You can try to build from [source code](https://github.com/mongodb/mongo).
I'd love to do that but Windows IOT core doesn't have terminal/command prompt
